FuncDef: This command specifies which days of the week that the schedule will fire on. Multiple days of the week can be specified. When multiple days are configured, each of them will cause the schedule to occur. If a weekday is configured without configuringmonth,day-of-month,hourandminute, the event will not execute.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies a weekday number. Values-1 to 7 (maximum 7 weekday-numbers).
Specifies a day by name. Values-sunday, monday, tuesday, wednesday, thursday, friday, saturday (maximum 7 weekday names).
Specifies all days of the week.
